articles.description: London: The spread of cancer around the body is a complex process. Researchers have uncovered how a process involved in the regeneration of tissue damaged by radiation can aid the spread of cancer. In the study, published in 'Nature Cancer', the scientists at…

articles.title: Researchers call for patient-centered approach to treating obesity - UB Now: News and views for UB faculty and staff - University at Buffalo Reporter
articles.description: Researchers say health professionals should improve access to evidence-based and patient-centered care to fight weight stigma and end diet culture.
articles.content:
It’s one of the most polarizing questions among clinicians: Is treating obesity while also reducing weight stigma and eating disorder risk mutually exclusive?
